name: RATTUS REX (translated fragments)
description:
Sixteen fragments recovered from the Rattish epic "RATTUS REX", told in the first person by an unidentified narrator, regarding a pilgrimage to seek the advice of the outcast Rattus Rex, circa 3e45.

Author unknown.

Translated from the original Rat Script B by Freya Campbell.

-

made for the Bitsy Rat Jam

-

thank you to Adam for making Bitsy
Sean for hacking it
Dana for further hacking it and the font.
